item.title: Clicking problem - simple fix! dunno how though xD
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

[code]case 54104:

if(c.playerHasItem(5291, 1)) {
if(c.playerLevel[19] >= 1) {
c.addItem(249, 1);
c.deleteItem(5291, 1);
c.sM(“You plant the Guam Seed and gain a little experience”);
c.addSkillXP(600, 19);
}
}

if(c.playerHasItem(5295, 1)) {
if(c.playerLevel[19] >=40) {
c.addItem(257, 1);
c.deleteItem(5295, 1);
c.addSkillXP(3000, 19);
c.sM(“You plant the Ranarr Seed and gain a little experience”);
}
}

break;[/code]

item.title: Clicking problem - simple fix! dunno how though xD
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Okay heres my code:
case 54104:

if(c.playerHasItem(5291, 1));
if(c.playerLevel[19] >= 1);
c.addItem(249, 1);
c.deleteItem(5291, 1);
c.sM(“You plant the Guam Seed and gain a little experience”);
c.addSkillXP(600, 19);

if(c.playerHasItem(5295, 1));
if(c.playerLevel[19] >=40);
c.addItem(257, 1);
c.deleteItem(5295, 1);
c.addSkillXP(3000, 19);
c.sM(“You plant the Ranarr Seed and gain a little experience”);

if(c.playerHasItem(5291, 0));

if(c.playerHasItem(5295, 0));

break;

Any ideas how to include
Else
in there??? when i try it comes up with “Else without if” when i compile
Help??
